author: parithosh
content: Are there any last minute client updates for ropsten? Or clients that need to be updated since the EF blog post went out with versions in them?

content: We are cutting rc3 tomorrow. The last build will work as long as `--terminal-total-difficulty-override 50000000000000000` is applied
